<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>

let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() || {})['手动登录Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(xGorgon("multi-detail", "book_id=" + i.join(","), null, ck))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "未分组": []
  }
  // java.log(
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["未分组"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(xGorgon("multi-detail", "book_id=" + i.join(","), null, ck))
  })
  
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = xGorgon(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32&device_id=1024&device_type=114514&iid=2048",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index]
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(tab))
  tab = tab.cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}
JSON.stringify({data: result.book_info || result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data})
</js>

let res = JSON.parse(result)

}
let books

if (res.search_tabs) {
  res.search_tabs.forEach((i) => {
    if (i.tab_type == 3) books = i.data
  })
} else books = res.data

let results = []

let a = Array.isArray(books) ? books : [books]
a.forEach(w => {
  results.push((w.book_data || [])[0] || [w][0])
})

JSON.stringify(results)

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'77800','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
Pixiv 小说（更新📆：2025-10-08）

书源版本：2.3.8
使用说明：📌阅读版本 3.25.0527 及之后版本可用
可用功能：✅搜索✅发现✅添加网址✅订阅源
搜索小说：✅单篇✅系列✅标签✅作者
发现小说：✅关注✅追更✅推荐✅发现
发现小说：✅收藏✅书签✅首页✅排行
添加网址：✅小说✅系列✅作者
订阅用法：点击订阅源打开小说/系列小说，【刷新】，点击【加入书架】按钮，添加到书架

书源发布：兽人阅读频道 https://t.me/FurryReading
项目地址：https://github.com/windyhusky/PixivSource
使用教程：https://github.com/windyhusky/PixivSource/blob/main/doc/Pixiv.md

规则订阅：import 订阅源
https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/windyhusky/PixivSource@main/import.json
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/windyhusky/PixivSource/main/import.json

⚙️ 书源设置：
设置1️⃣：打开小说 - 菜单 - 登录 - 点击下方按钮
设置2️⃣：编辑书源 - 基本 - 变量说明 - 修改并保存

🚫 屏蔽作者(本地)：
▶️设置方法：打开小说 - 菜单 - 登录 - 🚫 屏蔽作者

🚫 屏蔽标签/描述(本地)：
1️⃣编辑书源：菜单 - 登录 - 点击【 👀 查看屏蔽】
2️⃣切换列表：点击按钮，切换至【相应屏蔽列表】
3️⃣输入内容：在【输入内容】处输入屏蔽内容
4️⃣屏蔽作者：点击【🚫 加入屏蔽】，屏蔽该内容

📌 喜欢标签(本地)：
1️⃣编辑书源：菜单 - 登录 ，找到输入内容
2️⃣输入内容：输入标签，点击【📌 喜欢标签】

❤️ 查看他人收藏：
1️⃣编辑书源：菜单 - 登录 ，找到输入内容
2️⃣输入内容：输入作者ID，点击【❤️ 他人收藏】

@js:
let SHOW_R18_GENRE, SHOW_GENERAL_NEW, SHOW_GENERAL_RANK, SHOW_GENERAL_GENRE
try {
    settings = JSON.parse(String(source.variableComment).match(RegExp(/{([\s\S]*?)}/gm)))
    SHOW_R18_GENRE = settings.SHOW_R18_GENRE         // 发现：热门分类显示R18小说
    SHOW_GENERAL_NEW = settings.SHOW_GENERAL_NEW     // 发现：最新、企划、约稿显示一般小说
    SHOW_GENERAL_RANK = settings.SHOW_GENERAL_RANK   // 发现：排行榜显示一般小说
    SHOW_GENERAL_GENRE = settings.SHOW_GENERAL_GENRE // 发现：热门分类显示一般小说
} catch (e) {
    SHOW_R18_GENRE = false
    SHOW_GENERAL_NEW = false
    SHOW_GENERAL_RANK = false
    SHOW_GENERAL_GENRE = false
}

li = [
    {"⭐️ 关注": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/follow_latest/novel?p={{page}}&mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"📃 追更": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/watch_list/novel?p={{page}}&new=1&lang=zh"},
    {"💯 推荐": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/top/novel?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"🔍 发现": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/novel/discovery?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"❤️ 收藏": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/user/{{cache.get(\"pixiv:uid\")}}/novels/bookmarks?tag=&offset={{(page-1)*24}}&limit=24&rest=show&lang=zh"},
    {"㊙️ 收藏": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/user/{{cache.get(\"pixiv:uid\")}}/novels/bookmarks?tag=&offset={{(page-1)*24}}&limit=24&rest=hide&lang=zh"},
    {"🏷️ 书签": "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/marker_all.php"},
    {"🏠 首页": "https://www.pixiv.net"},
]

normal = [
    {"✅ 常规 小说 推荐 ✅": ""},
    {"⭐️ 关注": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/follow_latest/novel?p={{page}}&mode=all&lang=zh"},
    {"💯 推荐": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/top/novel?mode=all&lang=zh"},
    {"🔍 发现": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/novel/discovery?mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"🆙 更新": "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/windyhusky/PixivSource@main/pixiv.json"},
]

r18New = [
    {"🆕 最新 企划 约稿 💰": ""},
    {"🆕 最新": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/novel/new?lastId=0&limit=20&r18=true&lang=zh"},
    {"📑 企划": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/user_event/portal/novels?mode=r18&p={{page}}&lang=zh"},
    {"💰 约稿": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/commission/page/request/complete/novels?mode=r18&p={{page}}&lang=zh"},
    {"🔍 发现": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/novel/discovery?mode=all&lang=zh"},
]

generalNew = [
    {"✅ 最新 企划 约稿 ✅": ""},
    {"最新": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/novel/new?lastId=0&limit=20&r18=false&lang=zh"},
    {"企划": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/user_event/portal/novels?mode=all&p={{page}}&lang=zh"},
    {"约稿": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/commission/page/request/complete/novels?mode=all&p={{page}}&lang=zh"},
    {"编辑": "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/editors_picks"},
]

r18Rank = [
    {"👑 排行榜单 👑": ""},
    {"今日": "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/ranking.php?mode=daily_r18"},
    {"本周": "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/ranking.php?mode=weekly_r18"},
    {"R18G": "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/ranking.php?mode=r18g"},
    {"男性": "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/ranking.php?mode=male_r18"},
    {"女性": "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/ranking.php?mode=female_r18"}
]

generalRank = [
    {"🏆 排行榜单 🏆": ""},
    {"今日": "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/ranking.php?mode=daily"},
    {"本周": "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/ranking.php?mode=weekly"},
    {"本月": "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/ranking.php?mode=monthly"},
    {"男性": "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/ranking.php?mode=male"},
    {"女性": "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/ranking.php?mode=female"},
    {"新人": "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/ranking.php?mode=rookie"},
    {"原创": "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/ranking.php?mode=weekly_original"},
    {"AI生成": "https://www.pixiv.net/novel/ranking.php?mode=weekly_ai"}
]

r18Genre = [
    {"🔥 原创热门 🔥": ""},
    {"男性": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/male?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"女性": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/female?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"恋爱": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/romance?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"异世界奇幻": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/isekai_fantasy?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"现代奇幻": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/contemporary_fantasy?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"悬疑": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/mystery?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"恐怖": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/horror?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"科幻": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/sci-fi?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"文学": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/literature?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"情感": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/drama?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"历史": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/historical_pieces?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"耽美": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/bl?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"百合": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/yuri?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"散文·诗歌": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/poetry?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"随笔·纪实": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/non-fiction??mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"剧本": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/screenplays?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"评论": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/reviews?mode=r18&lang=zh"},
    {"其他": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/other?mode=r18&lang=zh"}
]

generalgGenre = [
    {"❤️‍🔥 原创热门 ❤️‍🔥": ""},
    {"综合": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/all?mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"恋爱": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/romance?mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"异世界奇幻": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/isekai_fantasy?mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"现代奇幻": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/contemporary_fantasy?mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"悬疑": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/mystery?mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"恐怖": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/horror?mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"科幻": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/sci-fi?mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"文学": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/literature?mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"情感": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/drama?mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"历史": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/historical_pieces?mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"耽美": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/bl?mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"百合": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/yuri?mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"散文·诗歌": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/poetry?mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"随笔·纪实": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/non-fiction??mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"剧本": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/screenplays?mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"评论": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/reviews?mode=safe&lang=zh"},
    {"其他": "https://www.pixiv.net/ajax/genre/novel/other?mode=safe&lang=zh"}
]

let likeTagLinks = [{"📌 喜欢标签 📌":""}]
let othersBookmarks = [{"❤️ 他人收藏 ❤️": ""}]

li = li.concat(normal)
li = li.concat(r18New)
if (SHOW_GENERAL_NEW === true) {
    li = li.concat(generalNew)
}
li = li.concat(r18Rank)
if (SHOW_GENERAL_RANK === true) {
    li = li.concat(generalRank)
}
if (SHOW_R18_GENRE === true) {
    li = li.concat(r18Genre)
}
if (SHOW_GENERAL_GENRE === true) {
    li = li.concat(generalgGenre)
}
sleepToast('使用指南🔖\n\n发现 - 更新 - 点击"🔰 使用指南" - 查看')

// 收藏标签
let likeTags = getFromCache("likeTags")
if (likeTags !== null && likeTags.length >= 1) {
    likeTags.forEach(tag => {
        let tagLink = {}
        tagLink[tag] = `${urlSearchNovel(tag, "{{page}}")}`
        likeTagLinks.push(tagLink)
    })
    li = li.concat(likeTagLinks)
}

// 他人收藏
let likeAuthors = getFromCacheMap("likeAuthors")
if (likeAuthors.size > 0) {
    likeAuthors.forEach((authorName, authorId) => {
        let bookmark = {}
        bookmark[authorName] = urlUserBookmarks(authorId)
        othersBookmarks.push(bookmark)
    })
    li = li.concat(othersBookmarks)
}

// 添加格式
li.forEach(item => {
    item.title = Object.keys(item)[0]
    item.url = Object.values(item)[0]
    delete item[Object.keys(item)[0]]
    item.style = {}
    item.style.layout_flexGrow = 1
    item.style.layout_flexShrink = 1
    item.style.layout_alignSelf = "auto"
    item.style.layout_wrapBefore = "false"
    if (item.url === "") {
        item.style.layout_flexBasisPercent = 1
    } else {
        item.style.layout_flexBasisPercent = -1
    }
})

JSON.stringify(li)

variableComment:
🚫 屏蔽作者(本地)：
▶️设置方法：打开小说 - 菜单 - 登录 - 🚫 屏蔽作者

🚫 屏蔽标签/描述(本地)：
1️⃣编辑书源：菜单 - 登录 - 点击【 👀 查看屏蔽】
2️⃣切换列表：点击按钮，切换至【相应屏蔽列表】
3️⃣输入内容：在【输入内容】处输入屏蔽内容
4️⃣屏蔽作者：点击【🚫 加入屏蔽】，屏蔽该内容

📌 喜欢标签(本地)：
1️⃣编辑书源：菜单 - 登录 ，找到输入内容
2️⃣输入内容：输入标签，点击【📌 喜欢标签】

❤️ 查看他人收藏：
1️⃣编辑书源：菜单 - 登录 ，找到输入内容
2️⃣输入内容：输入作者ID，点击【❤️ 他人收藏】


⚙️ 书源设置：
设置1️⃣：打开小说 - 菜单 - 登录 - 点击下方按钮
▶️ 搜索任意小说，同步设置数据

设置2️⃣：编辑书源 - 基本 - 变量说明 - 修改并保存
⚙️ 自定义设置：将 true 改为 false，或相反
⚠️ 设置源变量【无法】更改书源自定义设置
⚠️ 注意不要添加或删除尾随逗号","
⚠️ 更新发现页需要长按"Pixiv"，手动刷新
以下内容为书源设置：
{
"SHOW_GENERAL_NEW": false,
"SHOW_GENERAL_RANK": false,
"SHOW_R18_GENRE": false,
"SHOW_GENERAL_GENRE": false
}

// SHOW_GENERAL_NEW
// 发现：最新、企划、约稿显示一般小说
// SHOW_GENERAL_RANK
// 发现：排行榜显示一般小说
// SHOW_R18_GENRE
// 发现：热门分类显示R18小说
// SHOW_GENERAL_GENRE
// 发现：热门分类显示一般小说

    SHOW_GENERAL_RANK = settings.SHOW_GENERAL_RANK   // 发现：排行榜显示一般小说
    SHOW_GENERAL_GENRE = settings.SHOW_GENERAL_GENRE // 发现：热门分类显示一般小说
} catch (e) {
    SHOW_R18_GENRE = false
    SHOW_GENERAL_NEW = false
    SHOW_GENERAL_RANK = false
    SHOW_GENERAL_GENRE = false
}

li.forEach(item => {
    item.title = Object.keys(item)[0]
    item.url = Object.values(item)[0]
    delete item[Object.keys(item)[0]]
    item.style = {}
    item.style.layout_flexGrow = 1
    item.style.layout_flexShrink = 1
    item.style.layout_alignSelf = "auto"
    item.style.layout_wrapBefore = "false"
    if (item.url === "") {
        item.style.layout_flexBasisPercent = 1
    } else {
        item.style.layout_flexBasisPercent = -1
    }
})

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>

let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() || {})['手动登录Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(xGorgon("multi-detail", "book_id=" + i.join(","), null, ck))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "未分组": []
  }
  // java.log(
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["未分组"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(xGorgon("multi-detail", "book_id=" + i.join(","), null, ck))
  })
  
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = xGorgon(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32&device_id=983439455833884&device_type=NJOKZ75&iid=983439455837980",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index]
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(tab))
  tab = tab.cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}
JSON.stringify({data: result.book_info || result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data})
</js>
$.data[*]

let res = JSON.parse(result)
if (res.url) {
  res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(res.url))
}
let books

if (res.search_tabs) {
  res.search_tabs.forEach((i) => {
    if (i.tab_type == 3) books = i.data
  })
} else books = res.data

let results = []

let a = Array.isArray(books) ? books : [books]
a.forEach(w => {
  results.push((w.book_data || [])[0] || [w][0])
})

JSON.stringify(results)

bookSourceComment:
幻梦轻小说全网最齐全的轻小说网，访问速度优质而且网页内置插图，拥有海量的轻小说书籍，如果有网页bug或者需求的小说可以进网站群及时反馈


作者留言：

1.0更新：本网站所有的小说都是免费的，目前已经有了PC端和wap端，APP端目前还有点问题需要调试

本次初次制作好了对接阅读的书源，但是为了避免被大规模盗刷流量，书源暂时没有对接插图

2.0更新：本次更新解决了插图问题，让书源可以显示插图，显示不出来多刷新就行

站长在Cdn处新增速率限制，超过限制会被拉黑，国外地区也会无法访问插图，非官网访问也会无法访问插图

如果后续阅读方面流量过于异常，我会关闭阅读的阅读插图渠道，希望各位可以理解

2.1更新：新增发现页面的选项功能，用户可以更快速便捷的从分类和题材中寻找自己想要的小说

2.2更新：修复发现页面的分类功能异常的问题，现在移除文库分类

2.3更新：修复发现界面过于拥挤，点击作者无法快速搜索作者，总有几本推荐阅读始终占据分类书籍顶部的问题，这里感谢QQ用户雪隐梅香提供的修复


2.4更新：优化了插图排版的问题，如果插图不是一张图片一页，可以尝试在阅读界面右上角手动把图片样式改为SINGLE

2.5更新：本次网站将图床更换为了下行宽带200M的服务器，方便大家更快的使用。与此同时修复了更换图床后，插图异常不显示的问题

2.6更新：网友修改优化版本，由于海外线路需要人机交互，修复了海外线路被阻拦，无法使用书源的问题

2.7更新：修复阅读app下载过快，会触发拉黑的问题

更多详情内容，可以关注：www.huanmengacg.com

QQ讨论群：907189428

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function getBookIdFull(url) {
	const {java} = this
	$ = JSON.parse(url).data
	if ($.book_shelf_info != 0 && $.book_shelf_info != undefined) {
		arr = $.book_shelf_info.map($ => $.book_id)
	} else if (list = $.data_list != 0 && $.data_list != undefined)  {
		arr = $.data_list.map($ => $.book_id_str)
	} else {
		java.toast("获取 book_id 失败，你可能需要登录！")
	}
	return arr
}
let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {})['手动登录Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

let arrB = []
for (let i of JSON.parse(book_shelf_info).data.book_shelf_info) {
  arrB.push(i.book_id)
}
write_config('bookshelf.' + read_config('userinfo.userid'), arrB)

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.key + "/multi-detail?bookid=" + i.join(","))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)
let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "组外": []
  }
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "组外"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "组外"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["组外"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.key + "/multi-detail?bookid=" + i.join(","))
  })
  
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}

<js>
let replaceCover = (u) => {
    if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
    else u = u.substring(7)
    let uArr = u.split("/")
    uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
    let uArr2 = []
    uArr.forEach((x) => {
        if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
        else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
    })
    u = uArr2.join("/")
    return u
}
replaceCover(java.getString("thumb_url"))
</js>

@js:result.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

exploreUrl:
<js>
var discover = [];
var showR18 = false;
var push = (title, url, style) => {
    discover.push({
        title: title,
        url: url,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: style
        }
    });
};
var addSlots = (count, style) => {
    var remainder = count % 3;
    var slotsAdd = remainder === 0 ? 0 : 3 - remainder;
    for (var i = 0; i < slotsAdd; i++) {
        push("", null, style);
    }
};
push("书架", null, 1);
try {
    var favored = java.ajax(`${baseUrl}/api/user/favored`);
    if (favored.includes("Token不合法或者过期")) {
    	   showR18 = false;
        push("账号未登录", null, 0.25);
        addSlots(1, 0.25);
    } else {
    	   showR18 = true;
    	   push("阅读历史", "/api/user/read-history?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=30", 0.25);
        var favoredData = JSON.parse(favored).favoredWeb;
        favoredData.forEach(item => {
            push(item.title, `/api/user/favored-web/${item.id}?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=30&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=update`, 0.25);
        });
        addSlots(1 + favoredData.length, 0.25);
    }
} catch (e) {
	   showR18 = false;
    push("未知错误", null, 0.25);
    addSlots(1, 0.25);
}
push("来源", null, 1);
var providers = ["全部", "kakuyomu", "syosetu", "novelup", "hameln", "pixiv", "alphapolis"];
providers.forEach(provider => {
    var url = provider === "全部" ? 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${providers.slice(1).join('%2C')}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0` : 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${provider}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(provider, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(providers.length, 0.25);
push("类型", null, 1);
var types = ["全部", "连载中", "已完结", "短篇"];
types.forEach((type, index) => {
    var url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=${index}&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(type, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(types.length, 0.25);
push("分级", null, 1);
var levels = showR18 ? ["全部", "一般向", "R18"] : ["全部", "一般向"];
levels.forEach((level, index) => {
    var url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=0&level=${index}&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(level, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(levels.length, 0.25);
push("排序", null, 1);
var sorts = ["更新", "点击"];
sorts.forEach((sort, index) => {
    var url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=${index}`;
    push(sort, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(sorts.length, 0.25);
JSON.stringify(discover);
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
var login = () => {
    var username = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号");
    var password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
    var res = java.post(
        `${baseUrl.replace('n', 'auth')}/api/v1/auth/login`,
        JSON.stringify({
            username: username,
            password: password,
            app: "legado"
        }),
        {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
    );
    source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify({
        Authorization: `Bearer ${res.body()}`
    }));
}
login();
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var initUrl = book.bookUrl;
var url = initUrl.includes('api/novel') ? initUrl : initUrl.replace('/novel/', '/api/novel/');
var body = initUrl.includes('api/novel') ? result : java.ajax(url);
if (body.includes('ID不合适，应当使用')) {
    var match = body.match(/\/\w+\/[\w-]+/);
    url = `${book.origin}/api/novel${match}`;
    body = java.ajax(url);
}
if (body.includes("Token不合法或者过期")) {
    java.toast("当前会话已失效，请重新登录");
}
java.put('url', url);
body;
</js>
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
var value = String(book.getVariable("custom")) || String(source.getVariable());
var data = JSON.parse(result);
var cnIntro = data.introductionZh;
var jpIntro = data.introductionJp;
var intro = cnIntro ? (value === '5' ? jpIntro : ['6', '8'].includes(value) ? cnIntro + "\n‎\n" + jpIntro : ['7', '9'].includes(value) ? jpIntro + "\n‎\n" + cnIntro : cnIntro) : jpIntro;
var timeStamp = '{{$.toc[-1].createAt}}' || '{{$.syncAt}}';
intro = '  📬最近' + ('{{$.toc[-1].createAt}}' ? '更新' : '同步') + '：' + java.timeFormat(timeStamp * 1000) + '\n‎\n' + intro;
intro;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var token = source.getLoginHeader();
update(baseUrl, token);
var value = String(book.getVariable("custom")) || String(source.getVariable());
var get = /^[1-9]$/.test(value) ? value : '1';
var config = {
    1: 'sakuraParagraphs',
    2: 'gptParagraphs',
    3: 'youdaoParagraphs',
    4: 'baiduParagraphs',
    5: 'paragraphs'
};
var data = JSON.parse(result);
var content = data[config[get]] || data[config[1]] || data[config[2]] || data[config[3]] || data[config[4]] || data[config[5]];
if (['6', '7', '8', '9'].includes(get)) {
    var cnContent = data[config[1]] || data[config[2]] || data[config[3]] || data[config[4]];
    var jpContent = data[config[5]];
    if (cnContent) {
        if (['8', '9'].includes(get)) {
            var res = java.post(
                'https://static.kksk.io/api/kanji',
                JSON.stringify({"content": format(regex(jpContent))}),
                {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
            );
            var kanji = JSON.parse(res.body());
            jpContent = jpContent.map(text => annotate(text, kanji));
        }
        var type = ['6', '8'].includes(get);
        content = jpContent.flatMap((jp, i) => {
            if (!((jp || '').trim() && (cnContent[i] || '').trim())) return [];
            var pair = type ? [cnContent[i], jp] : [jp, cnContent[i]];
            return pair.filter(Boolean).concat(i === jpContent.length - 1 ? [] : '\u200B');
        }).filter(Boolean);
    } else {
        content = jpContent;
    }
}
format(regex(content));
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
var providers = {
    kakuyomu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?kakuyomu\.jp\/works\/(\d+)/,
    syosetu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(ncode|novel18)\.syosetu\.com\/(\w+)/,
    novelup: /(?:https?:\/\/)?novelup\.plus\/story\/(\d+)/,
    hameln: /(?:https?:\/\/)?syosetu\.org\/novel\/(\d+)/,
    pixiv: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/series\/(\d+)|www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/show\.php\?id=(\d+))/,
    alphapolis: /(?:https?:\/\/)?www\.alphapolis\.co\.jp\/novel\/(\d+)\/(\d+)/,
    sakura: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(?:books\d?\.fishhawk\.top|n\.novelia\.cc)\/(?:api\/)?novel\/(\w+)\/([\w-]+)/
};
var url;
for (var provider in providers) {
    var match = key.match(providers[provider]);
    if (match) {
        var providerId = provider === 'sakura' ? match[1] : provider;
        var novelId = provider === 'alphapolis' ? `${match[1]}-${match[2]}` : provider === 'pixiv' ? (match[3] ? `s${match[3]}` : match[2]) : (match[2] || match[1]);
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel/${providerId}/${novelId}`;
        break;
    }
}
if (!url) {
    url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel?page=${page-1}&pageSize=20&query=${key}&provider=kakuyomu,syosetu,novelup,hameln,pixiv,alphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=1`;
}
url;
</js>
variableComment: 输入对应数字刷新即可获取对应文本，{1: "sakura译文", 2: "gpt译文", 3: "有道译文", 4: "百度译文", 5: "原文", 6: "中日对照", 7: "日中对照", 8: "6+平假注音", 9: "7+平假注音"}，默认sakura译文。书籍变量作用于一本书，源变量作用于整个书源，书籍变量优先级高于源变量。

ruleContent.content:
<js>
function replace (content) {
  const source = "内暴强情缝贪插逼操潮喷阴艳裸乳荡穴鸡淫苞奸胸射嫩肉骚性蒂茎陰騷奶屄成人药春迷尿粉肛龟头A精屌口狂蜜处女唇道阳虐虫妇液色颜熟交爽臀爆舔做爱欲吹自慰点gG玉幼援抽Bb水母狗户部要了奴小脚痒酥死我兽揉搓捏扣抠棍棒洞密美少摩腿春乱伦露漏浪开巨根菊巴黑豪好肥送艳被干拔乱理白刺体下面诱感快货比日妈你娘婊子配仙火叫在里子宫给聊照流群屁眼马无码友拳洞片黄偷禁套弄位脱光舒服溜舞丢还糜妻换妓招嫖娼aA毛Hh一夜本热推图书娃男抓浑圆饱满润湿滑丰腴韵尤物横陈存娇喘息麻桃透风腹长粗肿胀人紧夹吸撅起来雪发翘硕大胴双草坐挲跨柔软臂瘫媚秘破"
  const replacementChars = source.split("")
  replacementChars[43]="AV"
  content = content.replace(/<i class="icon icon-uni(.{4})"><\/i>/g, (_, p1) => String.fromCharCode(parseInt(p1, 16)));

  return Array.from(content, char => {
    const code = char.charCodeAt(0)
    if (code >= 0xE001 && code <= 0xE101) {
      return replacementChars[code - 0xE001]
    } else {
      return char
    }
  }).join('')
}
replace(result)
</js>

gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>  
if (baseUrl.match(/ys/)) {  
    book.type = 32;  
    java.toast('听书模式');  
    java.getElements('html');
} else if (baseUrl.match(/huiben/)) {  
    book.type = 64;  
    java.toast('绘本模式');  
    java.getElements('html');
} else if (baseUrl.match(/(sketch|g)/)) {  
    book.type = 8;  
    java.toast('小说模式');  
    java.getElements('html');
}
</js>

    book.type = 32;  
    java.toast('听书模式');  
    java.getElements('html');
} else if (baseUrl.match(/huiben/)) {  
    book.type = 64;  
    java.toast('绘本模式');  
    java.getElements('html');
} else if (baseUrl.match(/(sketch|g)/)) {  
    book.type = 8;  
    java.toast('小说模式');  
    java.getElements('html');
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
$ = java.getString(".infoWen@html");
n = 0; 
v = String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x = v.match(/^\d+$/)? v : n;
x = parseInt(x) < $.length? x : n;
java.toast(x);

img = java.getString('[property="og:image"]@content');

if (v == 1) {
  bookUrlz = java.getString('source@src');
} else if(v==0){
  bookUrlz = baseUrl;
}

intro = "  简介：" + java.getString('[property="og:description"]@content') + "\n当前源链: " + bookUrlz+"\n文本简介:🔺'+0+'🔻"+baseUrl+
"\n音频链接:🔺'+1+'🔻"+java.getString('source@src');
data = {
  intro: intro,
  img: img,
  bookUrl: bookUrlz
};

JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

};

list

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var o = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var s = o.select("#newlist > li[data-id] > a"); 
var l = s.toArray().sort((a, b) => {
    var idA = parseInt(a.parent().attr("data-id"));
    var idB = parseInt(b.parent().attr("data-id"));
    return idA - idB;
});
var list = l.map(i => ({
    text: i.text().trim(),
    href: i.attr("href").trim()
}));
list
</js>
ruleToc.chapterName:
text
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

bookSourceComment:
10.3日更新：
重要：必要更新，适配兼容新后端版本，后续会移除对旧后端版本的支持，未更新会出现无法使用的情况
1.新增七猫短剧
2.优化番茄短剧和七猫短剧专属播放器

注：阅读请使用最新测试版
1.所有源站每20秒最多15章，建议预下载调到0-3之间[白名单无请求限制]
2.自定义源站示例：番茄小说,七猫小说  多个源站用英文,号分隔
源站名参考 登录URL //书源配置列表 v参数

3.源站带有❇️图标表示只能指定或通过@搜索

4.搜索模式：
书名@来源 多个来源用英文,号分隔
示例： 
系统@番茄小说，多个源站使用英文,号分隔
书名@类型 返回对应类型所有源站数据，可直接使用@方式搜索或者点击登陆切换模式
示例： 
系统@小说  听书  漫画  短剧等
默认书名排序
指定作者优先：
作者名@作者   作者名@作者,源站
exploreUrl:
<js>
let config = (() => {
    try {
        let cfg = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())[0] || {};
        if (!cfg.host || !cfg.gender) {
            cfg = {gender: "boy", host: getServerHost()};
            source.setVariable(JSON.stringify([cfg]));
            java.toast("配置初始化完成");
        }
        return cfg;
    } catch(e) {
        let cfg = {gender: "boy", host: getServerHost()};
        source.setVariable(JSON.stringify([cfg]));
        return cfg;
    }
})();
    
let rawVariable = source.getVariable();
let 个人中心 = 1;
let obj = (title, url, type) => ({
  title: title,
  url: url,
  style: { layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: type }
});

let sort = [];
let push = (title, url, type) => sort.push(obj(title, url, type));

let currentType = "";
let currentSource = "";
try {
  let vArray = JSON.parse(rawVariable);
  if (vArray.length > 0) {
    let v = vArray[0];
    currentType = v.gender || "";
    currentSource = v.source || "";
    
    if (currentSource == "推荐") {
      currentType = "recommend";
      v.gender = "recommend";
      source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(vArray));
    } else if (currentType == "recommend") {
      currentType = "boy";
      v.gender = "boy";
      source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(vArray));
    }
  }
} catch(e) {
  currentType = "";
  currentSource = "";
}

const getGenderDisplayName = (gender) => {
  if (gender == "boy") return "男频";
  if (gender == "girl") return "女频";
  if (gender == "recommend") return "推荐";
  return "";
};

const genderDisplay = getGenderDisplayName(currentType);

push(`当前为【${currentSource || "番茄小说"}】${genderDisplay ? `【${genderDisplay}】` : ''}`, "", 1);

const excludedSources = ["小说", "听书", "漫画", "视频", "短剧", "音频","番茄小说","fqxs"];

if (currentSource && currentSource !== "推荐" && !excludedSources.includes(currentSource)) {
  try {
    let apiUrl = `${getServerHost()}/type_api?source=${currentSource}`;
    if (currentType) {
      apiUrl += `&gender=${currentType}`;
    }
    
    let response = JSON.parse(java.ajax(apiUrl));
    
    if (response.data && response.data.found) {
      response.data.found.forEach(item => {
        let finalUrl = "";
        if (item.url) {
          finalUrl = `${getServerHost()}/type_api?source=${currentSource}&page={{page}}&url=${item.url}`;
          if (currentType) {
            finalUrl += `&gender=${currentType}`;
          }
        }
        sort.push({
          title: item.title,
          url: finalUrl,
          style: item.style || { layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.29 }
        });
      });
    } else {
      push(`【${currentSource}】${genderDisplay ? `【${genderDisplay}】` : ''}暂无数据`, "", 1);
    }
  } catch(e) {
    push(`【${currentSource}】${genderDisplay ? `【${genderDisplay}】` : ''}暂无数据`, "", 1);
  }
  JSON.stringify(sort);
} else if (currentType == "recommend" && currentSource == "推荐") {
  
  let maleCategories = [];
  try {
    let maleResponse = JSON.parse(java.ajax(getServerHost() +"/api?action=subcategories&top_category_id=1"));
      maleCategories = maleResponse.data;
  } catch(e) {
    push('男频分类加载失败，请检查网络', "", 1);
  }
  
  let femaleCategories = [];
  try {
    let femaleResponse = JSON.parse(java.ajax(getServerHost() +"/api?action=subcategories&top_category_id=2"));
femaleCategories = femaleResponse.data;
  } catch(e) {
    push('女频分类加载失败，请检查网络', "", 1);
  }
  
  if (maleCategories.length > 0) {
    push('♂️ 男频推荐 ♂️', "", 1);
    maleCategories.forEach(cat => {
      push(cat.name, `${getServerHost()}/api?action=books&sub_category_id=${cat.id}&limit=20&page={{page}}`, 0.29);
    });
  } else if (maleCategories.length == 0 && !femaleCategories.length == 0 && !femaleCategories.length > 0) {
    push('男频分类暂无数据', "", 1);
  }
  
  if (femaleCategories.length > 0) {
    push('♀️ 女频推荐 ♀️', "", 1);
    femaleCategories.forEach(cat => {
      push(cat.name, `${getServerHost()}/api?action=books&sub_category_id=${cat.id}&limit=20&page={{page}}`, 0.29);
    });
  } else if (femaleCategories.length === 0 && !maleCategories.length > 0) {
    push('女频分类暂无数据', "", 1);
  }
  
  JSON.stringify(sort);
} else {
  let recommendUrl = "https://api5-normal-lf.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookmall/cell/change/v1/?aid=1967&change_type=1&iid=1&app_name=novelapp&version_code=999&cell_id=7012498777642631182&algo_type=101&category_id=0";
let recommendPost = JSON.stringify({
    headers: { 
    Cookie: "sessionid=" + getSessionId() 
  }
});
  push('个性推荐', recommendUrl + "," + recommendPost, 0.29);
  push('巅峰榜单', 'https://fanqienovel.com/api/author/misc/top_book_list/v1/?limit=100&offset={{(page-1)*100}}', 0.29);
  push('出版榜单', 'https://fanqienovel.com/api/node/publication/list?page_index={{(page-1)*100}}&page_count=100', 0.29);
  push('爆更榜单', 'https://api-lf.fanqiesdk.com/api/novel/channel/homepage/rank/rank_list/v2/?aid=13&limit=50&offset={{(page-1)*100}}&side_type=15&type=1', 0.29);
  push('黑马榜单', 'https://api-lf.fanqiesdk.com/api/novel/channel/homepage/rank/rank_list/v2/?aid=13&limit=50&offset={{(page-1)*100}}&side_type=13&type=1', 0.29);
  push('热搜榜单', 'https://api-lf.fanqiesdk.com/api/novel/channel/homepage/rank/rank_list/v2/?aid=13&limit=50&offset={{(page-1)*100}}&side_type=12&type=1', 0.29);	

  let fqCategoryArr = [];
  let showCategories = currentType === "girl" ? [0] : (currentType == "boy" ? [1] : [0, 1]);

  showCategories.forEach(i => {
    try {
      let response = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`${getServerHost()}/type?new_category_tab=${i}`));
      let $ = response.data.category_tab_data;
      
      let tabName = $.tab_name || (i === 0 ? "女频" : "男频");
      fqCategoryArr.push(obj(`❤️${tabName}分类❤️`, null, 1));
      
      $.cell_data.forEach(c => {
        fqCategoryArr.push(obj(c.cell_name, null, 1));
        
        for (let j = 2; j < 5; j++) {
          c.atom_data.slice(1).forEach(a => {
            let d = a.category_data;
            if (d.name.length == j) {
              let gender = i;
              let genre = 0;
              let cid = d.category_id;
              
              fqCategoryArr.push({
                title: d.name,
                url: `${getServerHost()}/type?category_id=${cid}&genre=${genre}&gender=${gender}&limit=20&offset={{(page-1)*100}}`,
                style: {
                  layout_flexGrow: 1,
                  layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.29
                }
              });
            }
          });
        }
      });
    } catch (e) {
      fqCategoryArr.push(obj("分类加载失败，请重试", null, 1));
    }
  });

  fqCategoryArr.forEach(item => sort.push(item));

  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700' 
  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': "sessionid=" + getSessionId()
    }
  })));

  let username;
  if (book_shelf_info.code != 0) {
    个人中心 = 0;
  } else {
    let uinfo = java.ajax("https://fanqienovel.com/api/user/info/v2," + JSON.stringify({ 
      headers: { 
    Cookie: "sessionid=" + getSessionId() 
      }
    }));
    uinfo = JSON.parse(uinfo);
    username = uinfo.data.name;
  }

  let gro = [];
  let pushGro = (title, url, type) => gro.push(obj(title, url, type));

  let sArr = [];

  if (个人中心) {
    let groups_bookids = { "未分组": [] };
    book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
      if (!groups_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"]) 
        groups_bookids[i.group_name] = [];
      groups_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"].push(i.book_id);
    });

    Object.keys(groups_bookids).forEach(k => {
      pushGro(k, "https://fanqienovel.com/fqbookshelf/groupName/" + k, 0.4);
    });
    if (Object.keys(groups_bookids).length % 2 != 0) pushGro("占位", "", 0.4);
    
    sArr.push(obj(username + '的个人中心', '', 1));
    sArr.push(obj("我的书架", "https://fanqienovel.com/fqbookshelf", 1));
    sArr = sArr.concat(gro);
    sArr.push(obj("阅读历史","https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/read_history/list/v/?aid=1967&app_name=novelapp&channel=0&iid=1&offset={{(page-1)*100}}&os_version=12&version_code=59732," + JSON.stringify({ 
      headers: { 
    Cookie: "sessionid=" + getSessionId()
    }}), 1));
  }

  sort = sArr.concat(sort);
  JSON.stringify(sort);
}
</js>

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function getBookIdFull(url) {
    const {java} = this
    $ = JSON.parse(url).data
    if ($.book_shelf_info != 0 && $.book_shelf_info != undefined) {
        arr = $.book_shelf_info.map($ => $.book_id)
    } else if (list = $.data_list != 0 && $.data_list != undefined)  {
        arr = $.data_list.map($ => $.book_id_str)
    } else {
        java.toast("获取 book_id 失败，你可能需要登录！")
    }
    return arr
}

let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {})['手动登录Token'])

getShelf = () => {
    let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
    let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
        headers: {
            'Cookie': ck
        }
    }))

    bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
    let id_list = splitArray(bid, 200)
    let urls = []
    id_list.forEach(i => {
        urls.push(getServerHost() +"/detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
    })

    res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

    let resp = {book_info: []}
    res.forEach(r => {
        resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
    })

    return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
    let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

    let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
        headers: {
            'Cookie': ck,
        }
    })))
    let group_bookids = {
        "未分组": []
    }
    book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
        if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
        group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"].push(i.book_id)
    })
    
    if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
    
    let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 200)
    let urls = []

    book_ids.forEach(i => {
        urls.push(getServerHost() +"/detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
    })
    
    res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

    let resp = {book_info: []}
    res.forEach(r => {
        resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
    })

    return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
    let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
        "bookmall/tab",
        "version_name=5.8.9.32",
        null,
        ck
    )
    let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
    let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
    if (!tab) tab = []
    let bookList = []
    for (let i of tab) {
        bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    }
    return { book_info: bookList }
}

function normalizeResponse(data) {
    if (data.book_info) return data.book_info;
    if (data.data && data.data.book_info) return data.data.book_info;
    if (data.data && Array.isArray(data.data)) return data.data;
    if (data.list) return data.list;
    if (data.book_list) return data.book_list;
    if (data.data && data.data.publication_list) return data.data.publication_list;
    if (data.result) return data.result;
    if (data.data && data.data.result) return data.data.result;
    if (data.data && data.data.cell_view && data.data.cell_view.book_data) {
        return data.data.cell_view.book_data;
    }
    if (data.data && data.data.records) return data.data.records;
    if (data.data && data.data.list) return data.data.list;
    return [];
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) {
    result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
} else if(/read_history/.test(baseUrl)) {
    bid = getBookIdFull(result);
    id_list = splitArray(bid, 200);
    let urls = [];
    id_list.forEach(i =>{    	urls.push("https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id=" + i.join(","))
    });
    let resp = {book_info: []}
    urls.forEach(r => {
        resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(java.ajax(r)).data)
    })
    result = resp;
} else {
    let w = baseUrl.split("/")
    if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
        result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
    } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
        result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
    } else {
        result = JSON.parse(result)
        if (result.data && result.data.data) {
            result = {book_info: result.data.data}
        }
    }
}

let normalizedData = normalizeResponse(result);

JSON.stringify({data: normalizedData})
</js>

ruleExplore.bookUrl:
<js>
let tjurl = result.tjurl;
let source = result.source;
let book_url = result.book_url;
let title = result.title || result.book_name;
let book_id = result.book_id || result.series_id;

let detail = {
    source: source,
    url: book_url,
    name: title
};

if (tjurl && tjurl.trim() !== "") {
    let sourceMatch = tjurl.match(/source=([^&]*)/);
    let urlMatch = tjurl.match(/url=([^&]*)/);
    let nameMatch = tjurl.match(/name=([^&]*)/);
    
    detail.source = sourceMatch ? sourceMatch[1] : "";
    detail.url = urlMatch ? urlMatch[1] : java.base64Encode(tjurl.trim());
    detail.name = nameMatch ? nameMatch[1] : "";
} 
else if (book_id && /^\d{19}$/.test(book_id)) {
    detail.url = java.base64Encode(`https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id=${book_id}`);
    detail.source = "番茄小说";
} else if (book_url) {
    detail.url = java.base64Encode(book_url);
}

let yunurl = java.base64Encode(JSON.stringify(detail));
`data:detailsUrl;base64,${yunurl},{"type":"qingci"}`;
</js>

let catalog = {

    url: res.url,
    name: res.name,
    tab: res.tab || "novel"
};

var tabTips = {audio: '听书', video: '视频', comic: '漫画'}; 
if (tabTips[catalog.tab]) {
    java.toast('当前为' + tabTips[catalog.tab] + '模式');
}

let op = {
    method: "POST",
    body: {
        source: catalog.source,
        url: catalog.url,
        name: catalog.name
    }
};

let catalogUrl = getServerHost() +`/catalog,${JSON.stringify(op)}`;
let response = java.ajax(catalogUrl);

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

let device = deviceType() ? 'android' : 'ios';

if (device == 'android') {
    var typeMap = {audio:32, comic:64};
    book.type = catalog.tab in typeMap ? typeMap[catalog.tab] : 8;
} else {
    var typeMap = {audio:1, comic:2, video:3};
    book.type = catalog.tab in typeMap ? typeMap[catalog.tab] : 0;
}

JSON.parse(response).data.map((x) => {
    const isFanqieApp = ['番茄小说', '番茄短剧', '番茄听书', '番茄畅听'].includes(catalog.source);
    const urlToMatch = x.url || catalog.url;
    const bookId = urlToMatch.match(/book_id=(\d{19})\b/)?.[1] || null;
    const itemId = urlToMatch.match(/item_id=(\d+)/)?.[1] || null;
    
    let contentUrl = getServerHost() + `/chapter?cid=${x.cid}&source=${catalog.source}`;
    
    if (!isFanqieApp) {
        contentUrl += `&url=${catalog.url}`;
    } else {
        contentUrl += `&book_id=${bookId}&item_id=${itemId}`;
        
        if (['番茄听书', '番茄畅听'].includes(catalog.source)) {
            const toneId = Number((source.getLoginInfoMap())['听书AI音色编号']) || 1;
            contentUrl += `&tone_id=${toneId}`;
        }
    }
    
    if (catalog.source == '番茄小说') {
        const commentPart = `{"js":"book ? result : '${getServerHost()}/comment?sessionid=${getSessionId()}&item_id=${itemId}&book_id=${bookId}'"}`;
        x.url = `${contentUrl},${commentPart}`;
    } else {
        x.url = contentUrl;
    }
    
    return x;
});
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
let config = (() => {
    try {
        let cfg = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())[0] || {};
        if (!cfg.host || !cfg.gender) {
            cfg = {gender: "boy", host: getServerHost()};
            source.setVariable(JSON.stringify([cfg]));
            java.toast("配置初始化完成");
        }
        return cfg;
    } catch(e) {
        let cfg = {gender: "boy", host: getServerHost()};
        source.setVariable(JSON.stringify([cfg]));
        return cfg;
    }
})();

var sourceVal = '';
var customSource = (source.getLoginInfoMap())['自定义源站'];

if (customSource !== undefined && customSource !== null && String(customSource).trim() !== "") {
    sourceVal = String(customSource).trim();
} else if (config.source) {
    sourceVal = config.source;
}

var param = sourceVal ? '&source=' + encodeURIComponent(sourceVal) : '';
var searchUrl = getServerHost() + '/search?page={{page}}&key={{key}}' + param;

if (key.length == 19 && !Number.isNaN(parseInt(key))) {
    var u = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id=${key}`;
    var kdy = java.base64Encode(u);
    var response = JSON.parse(java.ajax(u));
    var nam = response.data.book_name || response.data[0].book_name;
    result = getServerHost() + `/details?url=${kdy}&source=番茄小说&name=${nam}`;
} else {
    result = searchUrl;
}
</js>

# 关于许可的额外声明（在线版本参见 GitHub，以在线版本为准）

- 当许可证与本声明冲突时，以本声明为准；
- 对于本仓库中的任意代码片段：按照 `MPL 2.0` 中有关约定执行；
- 对于本仓库中的某一完整书源的转载或二次开发，需满足以下全部条件：
  - 在[本仓库](https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado)的 `issue` 中提出请求并具体说明转载地址、二次开发后的书源开源地址以及其他必要信息；
  - 等待原作者（即本仓库的初始所有者和初始代码贡献者 [@jiwangyihao](https://github.com/jiwangyihao)）查看并通过 `issue` 或依据原作者要求更改转载方式或补充更详细的信息。
  - 考虑到本项目弃坑的可能，新 `issue` 开启后超过 20 个工作日原作者没有回复或者原作者回复要求更改的 `issue` 在更改后超过 20 个工作日原作者没有回复即视为原作者通过该 `issue`：
    - 此处的 `issue` 仅包括在[本仓库](https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado)开启的，处于「开启状态」的 issue。（也就是说，请不要在已经关闭的 issue 中回复）。
    - 对于此种方式通过的 issue，转载/二次开发者仍应当遵守本声明中已经写明的相关约定。
  - 不得上传至源仓库或整理至`非轻小说专用`的书源合集中并应当避免其他人将转载/二次开发版本上传至源仓库或整理至`非轻小说专用`的书源合集中：
    - 关于轻小说的定义的额外说明：不包括国内的原创网络文学作品（如 `SF 轻小说` 中的原创轻小说以及`起点中文网`中标签包含轻小说的作品）。
    - 轻小说专用的定义：有且仅有想看轻小说的人可能会添加。
  - 必须在转载/二次开发地址的明显位置完整包含本声明的全部内容。
  - 必须保留源注释中原有的更改记录。

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
var data=[]
list=java.getElements('.g')
c=java.getElements('.content')
for(i=0;i<list.length;i++){
	text=list[i].select('a').text()
	href=list[i].select('a').attr('href')
	author=list[i].select('font').text()
	desc=c[i].text()
	data.push(JSON.stringify({
		text,href,desc,author
	}))
}
data

<js>
list=JSON.parse(result).sources
Json=[]
for(i in list){

for(j in list1){

Json.push(list1[j])
}
}
}
result=JSON.stringify(Json)
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
let ul = source.getKey() + "/search.html";
let headers = {
  "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 9) Mobile Safari/537.36",
  "cookie": "1"
};
let cc = java.post(ul, `searchkey=${key}`, headers).header("Location");
let next = String(cc).replace(/1\.html$/, `${page}.html`);
result = source.key + next;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
可下载可在线观看,下载需要改成【文件】
@天天的鸟蛋蛋：修复搜索
原来的源只能用【发现】，
我发现手机版能【搜索】，
电脑版【搜索】找不到【列表】，
于是就用手机版的【搜索】顶替电脑版的【搜索】。
2025/3/5 更新优化搜索加入搜索下一页 优化，发现

// Error: Expected to find an object with property ['data'] in path $['data'] but found 'null'. This is not a json object according to the JsonProvider: 'cb.e'.

此书源可以开箱即用，无需进行其他操作
但由于此书源API来自于番茄Web共享API服务项目，API来自于共享地址，而共享地址目前仅来自一台云手机
此书源使用Xposed模块番茄Web 搭建
番茄Web地址：因版权原因，请自行搜索
模块下载：自行使用action
书源：netsite
目前免费线路会时不时断线，如果你有经济可以赞助我：
https://afdian.com/a/netsite

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "第一卷：默认"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = (book.getVariable("custom") != "" && book.getVariable("custom") != null) ? book.getVariable("custom") : source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      c.url  = source.bookSourceUrl +  `/content?item_id=${c.itemId}`;
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>

20231123 整体修复-尐哖
旧域名：https://api.aixdzs.com
exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey();
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

text
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/^(第)?([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+).+第/,'第')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

bookSourceComment:
10.3日更新：
重要：必要更新，适配兼容新后端版本，后续会移除对旧后端版本的支持，未更新会出现无法使用的情况
1.新增七猫短剧
2.优化番茄短剧和七猫短剧专属播放器

注：阅读请使用最新测试版
1.所有源站每20秒最多15章，建议预下载调到0-3之间[白名单无请求限制]
2.自定义源站示例：919,思兔  多个源站用英文,号分隔
源站名参考 登录URL //书源配置列表 v参数

3.源站带有❇️图标表示只能指定或@搜索

4.搜索模式：
书名@来源 多个来源用英文,号分隔
示例： 
系统@番茄小说，多个源站使用英文,号分隔
书名@类型 返回对应类型所有源站数据，可直接使用@方式搜索或者点击登陆切换模式
示例： 
系统@小说  听书  漫画  短剧等
默认书名排序
指定作者优先：
作者名@作者   作者名@作者,源站
exploreUrl:
<js>
let config = (() => {
    try {
        let cfg = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())[0] || {};
        if (!cfg.host || !cfg.gender) {
            cfg = {gender: "boy", host: getServerHost()};
            source.setVariable(JSON.stringify([cfg]));
            java.toast("配置初始化完成");
        }
        return cfg;
    } catch(e) {
        let cfg = {gender: "boy", host: getServerHost()};
        source.setVariable(JSON.stringify([cfg]));
        return cfg;
    }
})();

let obj = (title, url, type) => ({
  title: title,
  url: url,
  style: { layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: type }
});

let sort = [];
let push = (title, url, type) => sort.push(obj(title, url, type));

let currentType = "";
let currentSource = "";
try {
  let vArray = JSON.parse(source.getVariable());
  if (vArray.length > 0) {
    let v = vArray[0];
    currentType = v.gender || "";
    currentSource = v.source || "";
  }
} catch(e) {
  currentType = "";
  currentSource = "";
}

const getGenderDisplayName = (gender) => {
  if (gender == "boy") return "男频";
  if (gender == "girl") return "女频";
  if (gender == "recommend") return "推荐";
  return gender;
};

const genderDisplay = getGenderDisplayName(currentType);

push(`当前为【${currentSource || "💞推 荐💞"}】${genderDisplay ? `【${genderDisplay}】` : ''}`, "", 1);

const excludedSources = ["小说", "听书", "漫画", "视频", "短剧", "音频"];

if (currentSource && currentSource !== "推荐" && !excludedSources.includes(currentSource)) {
  try {
    let apiUrl = `${getServerHost()}/type_api?source=${currentSource}`;
    if (currentType) {
      apiUrl += `&gender=${currentType}`;
    }
    
    let response = JSON.parse(java.ajax(apiUrl));
    
    if (response.data && response.data.found) {
      response.data.found.forEach(item => {
        let finalUrl = "";
        if (item.url) {
          finalUrl = `${getServerHost()}/type_api?source=${currentSource}&page={{page}}&url=${item.url}`;
          if (currentType) {
            finalUrl += `&gender=${currentType}`;
          }
        }
        sort.push({
          title: item.title,
          url: finalUrl,
          style: item.style || { layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.29 }
        });
      });
    } else {
      push(`【${currentSource}】${genderDisplay ? `【${genderDisplay}】` : ''}暂无数据`, "", 1);
    }
  } catch(e) {
    push(`【${currentSource}】${genderDisplay ? `【${genderDisplay}】` : ''}暂无数据`, "", 1);
  }
} 
else {
  let maleCategories = [];
  try {
    let maleResponse = JSON.parse(java.ajax(getServerHost() +"/api?action=subcategories&top_category_id=1"));
    maleCategories = maleResponse.data;
  } catch(e) {}

  let femaleCategories = [];
  try {
    let femaleResponse = JSON.parse(java.ajax(getServerHost() +"/api?action=subcategories&top_category_id=2"));
    femaleCategories = femaleResponse.data;
  } catch(e) {}

  if (maleCategories.length > 0) {
    push('♂️ 男频推荐 ♂️', "", 1);
    maleCategories.forEach(cat => {
      push(cat.name, `${getServerHost()}/api?action=books&sub_category_id=${cat.id}&limit=20&page={{page}}`, 0.29);
    });
  } else {
    push('♂️ 男频分类加载失败', "", 1);
  }

  if (femaleCategories.length > 0) {
    push('♀️ 女频推荐 ♀️', "", 1);
    femaleCategories.forEach(cat => {
      push(cat.name, `${getServerHost()}/api?action=books&sub_category_id=${cat.id}&limit=20&page={{page}}`, 0.29);
    });
  } else {
    push('♀️ 女频分类加载失败', "", 1);
  }
}

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookUrl:
<js>
let tjurl = result.tjurl;
let source = result.source;
let book_url = result.book_url || result.url;
let title = result.title || result.book_name;

let detail = {
    source: source,
    url: book_url,
    name: title
};

if (tjurl && tjurl.trim() !== "") {
    let sourceMatch = tjurl.match(/source=([^&]*)/);
    let urlMatch = tjurl.match(/url=([^&]*)/);
    let nameMatch = tjurl.match(/name=([^&]*)/);
    
    detail.source = sourceMatch ? sourceMatch[1] : "";
    detail.url = urlMatch ? urlMatch[1] : java.base64Encode(tjurl.trim());
    detail.name = nameMatch ? nameMatch[1] : "";
} 
else if (book_url) {
    detail.url = java.base64Encode(book_url);
}

let yunurl = java.base64Encode(JSON.stringify(detail));
`data:detailsUrl;base64,${yunurl},{"type":"qingci"}`;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let res = JSON.parse(java.hexDecodeToString(result));
let catalog = {
    source: res.source,
    url: res.url,
    name: res.name,
    tab: res.tab || "novel"
};

var tabTips = {audio: '听书', video: '视频', comic: '漫画'}; 
if (tabTips[catalog.tab]) {
    java.toast('当前为' + tabTips[catalog.tab] + '模式');
}

let op = {
    method: "POST",
    body: {
        source: catalog.source,
        url: catalog.url,
        name: catalog.name
    }
};

let catalogUrl = getServerHost() +`/catalog,${JSON.stringify(op)}`;
let response = java.ajax(catalogUrl);

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

let device = deviceType() ? 'android' : 'ios';

if (device == 'android') {
    var typeMap = {audio:32, comic:64};
    book.type = catalog.tab in typeMap ? typeMap[catalog.tab] : 8;
} else {
    var typeMap = {audio:1, comic:2, video:3};
    book.type = catalog.tab in typeMap ? typeMap[catalog.tab] : 0;
}

JSON.parse(response).data.map((x) => {
    const isFanqieApp = ['番茄小说', '番茄短剧', '番茄听书', '番茄畅听'].includes(catalog.source);
    const urlToMatch = x.url || catalog.url;
    const bookId = urlToMatch.match(/book_id=(\d{19})\b/)?.[1] || null;
    const itemId = urlToMatch.match(/item_id=(\d+)/)?.[1] || null;
    
    let contentUrl = getServerHost() + `/chapter?cid=${x.cid}&source=${catalog.source}`;
    
    if (!isFanqieApp) {
        contentUrl += `&url=${catalog.url}`;
    } else {
        contentUrl += `&book_id=${bookId}&item_id=${itemId}`;
        
        if (['番茄听书', '番茄畅听'].includes(catalog.source)) {
            const toneId = Number((source.getLoginInfoMap())['听书AI音色编号']) || 1;
            contentUrl += `&tone_id=${toneId}`;
        }
    }
    
    if (catalog.source == '番茄小说') {
        const commentPart = `{"js":"book ? result : '${getServerHost()}/comment?sessionid=${getSessionId()}&item_id=${itemId}&book_id=${bookId}'"}`;
        x.url = `${contentUrl},${commentPart}`;
    } else {
        x.url = contentUrl;
    }
    
    return x;
});
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
let config = (() => {
    try {
        let cfg = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())[0] || {};
        if (!cfg.host || !cfg.gender) {
            cfg = {gender: "boy", host: getServerHost()};
            source.setVariable(JSON.stringify([cfg]));
            java.toast("配置初始化完成");
        }
        return cfg;
    } catch(e) {
        let cfg = {gender: "boy", host: getServerHost()};
        source.setVariable(JSON.stringify([cfg]));
        return cfg;
    }
})();

var sourceVal = '';
var customSource = (source.getLoginInfoMap())['自定义源站'];

if (customSource !== undefined && customSource !== null && String(customSource).trim() !== "") {
    sourceVal = String(customSource).trim();
} else if (config.source) {
    sourceVal = config.source;
}

var param = sourceVal ? '&source=' + encodeURIComponent(sourceVal) : '';
var searchUrl = getServerHost() + '/searchs?page={{page}}&key={{key}}' + param;

if (key.length == 19 && !Number.isNaN(parseInt(key))) {
    var u = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id=${key}`;
    var kdy = java.base64Encode(u);
    var response = JSON.parse(java.ajax(u));
    var nam = response.data.book_name || response.data[0].book_name;
    result = getServerHost() + `/details?url=${kdy}&source=番茄小说&name=${nam}`;
} else {
    result = searchUrl;
}
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
var sort = [];
var push = function(title, url, type1, type2) {
    sort.push({
        title: title,
        url: url,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: type1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: type2
        }
    });
};

var typeNames = ["全部", "恋爱", "纯爱", "古风", "异能", "悬疑", "剧情", "科幻", "奇幻", "玄幻", "穿越", "冒险", "推理", "武侠", "格斗", "战争", "热血", "搞笑", "大女主", "都市", "总裁", "后宫", "日常", "韩漫", "少年", "其它"];
var types = ["all","lianai","chunai","gufeng","yineng","xuanyi","juqing","kehuan","qihuan","xuanhuan","chuanyue","mouxian","tuili","wuxia","gedou","zhanzheng","rexie","gaoxiao","danuzhu","dushi","zongcai","hougong","richang","hanman","shaonian","qita"];

typeNames.forEach(function(item, index) {
    var url = "https://cn.baozimhcn.com/api/bzmhq/amp_comic_list?type=" + types[index] + "&region=all&filter=&page={{page}}&limit=36&language=cn&__amp_source_origin=https%3A%2F%2Fcn.baozimhcn.com";
    push(item, url, 1, 0.25);
});
JSON.stringify(sort)
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
function $(rule){
	return java.getElements(rule);
}
var tab_name="",v_list=[];
//获取所有线路❗️
tab=$('.nav-tabs@li')
for(i=0;i<tab.length;i++){
	//获取播放列表❗️
	list=$('.mb-2.1')[0]
	if(list==undefined){
		tab_name=`${tab[i].select('a').attr('title')} (1)`;
		text=tab[i].text();
		url=tab[i].select('a').attr('href');
		v_list.push(JSON.stringify({
			name:text,
			href:url,
			tab:tab_name
		}))
	}else{
		len=list.select('a').length;
		url=tab[i].select('a').attr('href');
		v_id=url.match(/^\/(\d+)/)[1];
		tab_id=url.match(/\/(\d+)$/)[1];
		tab_name=`${tab[i].select('a').attr('title')} (${len})`;
		for(j=1;j<=len;j++){
			v_list.push(JSON.stringify({
				name:j,
				href:`/${v_id}/${j}/${tab_id}`,
				tab:tab_name
			}))
		}
	}
}
v_list
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
function getVerificationCode(){
	phone = result.get("手机号")
phoneCrypto = java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/Pkcs5Padding", "c98be79a4347bc97", "93x0ue23c2c9h8km").encryptBase64(phone);
sendUrl = "https://api.kilamanbo.com/api/v476/user/sendValidateCode";
signSend = java.md5Encode("nJi9o;/bizType=0&mobile="+phoneCrypto+"&source=86");

sendBody = "mobile="+java.encodeURI(phoneCrypto)+"&bizType=0&source=86&sign="+signSend;
sendBodyPost = {
	"method":"POST",
	"body":String(sendBody),
	"headers":{
		"ua":"appid=12",
"_c":"20",
"appId":"12",
"User-Agent": "okhttp/4.9.0"
		}
	}
sendUrl = sendUrl+","+JSON.stringify(sendBodyPost);
java.toast(JSON.parse(java.ajax(sendUrl)).h.msg);

	}

function login(){

phone = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("手机号");
code = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("验证码");
phoneCrypto = java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/Pkcs5Padding", "c98be79a4347bc97", "93x0ue23c2c9h8km").encryptBase64(phone);
codeUrl = "https://api.kilamanbo.com/api/v476/user/cellPhoneLogin";

signCode = java.md5Encode("nJi9o;/code="+code+"&mobile="+phoneCrypto+"&source=86");

codeBody = "mobile="+java.encodeURI(phoneCrypto)+"&code="+code+"&source=86&sign="+signCode;

token = java.post(codeUrl,codeBody,{"ua":"appid=12","_c":"20","appId":"12","User-Agent": "okhttp/4.9.0"}).header("x-auth-token");

header = {
	"x-auth-token":String(token)
	}
source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(header))
	
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var arr = baseUrl.split('/');
var songtype = arr[3];
var songid = arr[4].split('.')[0];
/*
var data = java.ajax("http://service.5sing.kugou.com/song/getSongUrl?version=6.6.70&songid=" + songid + "&songtype=" + songtype);
data = JSON.parse(data).data
data.squrl || data.hqurl || data.lqurl;
*/
	
let params = {
  appid: 3146,
  clienttime: Math.ceil(Date.now() / 1000),
  clientver: 610850,
  dfid: "-",
  from: "com.sing.client.player",
  mid: 114514,
  songfields: "ID,SN,SK,SW,SS,ST,SI,CT,M,S,ZQ,WO,ZC,HY,YG,CK,D,RQ,DD,E,R,RC,SG,C,CS,LV,LG,SY,UID,PT,SCSR,SC,KM5",
  songid: songid,
  songtype: songtype,
  token: "",
  userfields: "ID,NN,I,YCRQ,FCRQ",
  uuid: "-"
}

let signstr = ""
let keys = Object.keys(params).sort()
for (let i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) {
  signstr += `${keys[i]}=${params[keys[i]]}`
}
let signature = java.md5Encode("UqgPMZpjgRZQ7s8JAuUIP5DQdo5O5NB" + signstr + "UqgPMZpjgRZQ7s8JAuUIP5DQdo5O5NB")

let querys = []
for (let i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) {
  querys.push(`${keys[i]}=${params[keys[i]]}`.replace(/\,/g, "%2c"))
}
let querystr = querys.join("&") + "&signature=" + signature
let request = java.ajax("https://5sapi.kugou.com/song/getSongUrl?" + querystr)
// java.log(request)
let data = JSON.parse(request).data
data.squrl || data.squrl_backup || data.hqurl || data.hqurl_backup || data.lqurl || data.lqurl_backup
</js>
