ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
let data;
try {
        var res = JSON.parse(result);
    } catch (e) {
        java.log("JSON解析错误: " + e);
        let data = {
        	name: "失败！",
        	author: "失败！"
        	}
        	var res = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(data));
    }

var musicList = [];

res.forEach ( function ( data, i ) {
	var name = data.songName;

 var write = data.singerList.map(singer => singer.name);
 var author = write.join(" ");
 
 if ( data.album ) {
    var album = "专辑名称：" + data.album;
 } else {
    var album = "";
 }  

 var kind = "共播放" + data.playNumDesc + "次" + " | " + "时长：" + data.duration + "秒" + " | "  + album;
 
 if ( cover != "" || cover != null ) {
 	var cover = data.img1;
 	} else {
 	var cover = data.img2;
 	}
 	
 	var api = getAPI();
 	var contentId = data.contentId;
 	var ringCopyrightId = data.ringCopyrightId;
 	var header = `{"headers": {"channel": "014000D"},"method": "GET"}`;

 var iurl = `${api}/MIGUM3.0/strategy/pc/listen/v1.0?resourceType=2&contentId=${contentId}&copyrightId=${ringCopyrightId}&toneFlag=PQ,${header}`

musicList.push({
       	musicName: name,
       	musicAuthor: author,
       	musicSort: String(kind),
       	musicCover: cover,
       	musicInfo: iurl
  	})
	})
musicList
</js>

const data = JSON.parse(result);

const url = data.data.url;
const songName = data.data.song.songName;
const singerList = data.data.song.singerList.map(singer => singer.name);
const t = data.data.audioFormatType;

var kind = singerList + t;
var mp3 = url + getHeader();
var list = [];

list.push({
	musicName: songName,
	kind: kind,
	music: mp3
	})
list
</js>

<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//创建两个空数组
json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有列表
if(JSON.parse(result).info.Datas){
json=JSON.parse(result).info.Datas;}

//加载单曲搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.missevan.com/sound/getsearch?s='+key+'&type=3&page_size=10&p='+page));

//判定json里是否有列表
if(json1.info.Datas){
json2=json1.info.Datas
}

//剧集搜索列表与单曲搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>

◎编辑书籍详情页，在简介内容填上 【只看楼主】  保存，刷新书籍页（有已缓存的正文记得正文也要刷新）

  let chars = '0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'
  let result = ''
  for (var i = length; i > 0; --i) {
    result += chars[Math.floor(Math.random() * chars.length)]
  }
  return result
})(50);

  let t = parseInt(Date.now() / 1000)

{{$.introduce}} if(/apk\/detail/.test(baseUrl)){ result = result }else{ result = "" }

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(!/apk\/detail/.test(baseUrl)){
    let id = "{{$.data.id}}";
    let html = ""
    let item = JSON.parse(result).data;
    let curPage = 1;
    let lastItem = "";
    let resp2 = JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://api.coolapk.com/v6/feed/replyList?id={{$.data.id}}&page=1&lastItem="));
    let replynum5 = item.replynum;
    replynum5 > 100?replynum5=100:replynum5
    html += createReply(item)
    let item_reply = []
    let totalnum = 0
    let item2 = resp2.data
    item_reply = item_reply.concat(item2)
    while (item2.length && (totalnum = totalnum + item2.length) < replynum5) {
      curPage = curPage + 1
      lastItem = item2[item2.length - 1].id
      resp2 = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`https://api.coolapk.com/v6/feed/replyList?id=${id}&page=${curPage}&lastItem=${lastItem}`))
      item2 = resp2.data
      item_reply = item_reply.concat(item2)
    }

    let grouped_item_reply = {}
    item_reply.map(item => {
      if (item.rrid) {
        grouped_item_reply[item.rrid] = grouped_item_reply[item.rrid] || []
        grouped_item_reply[item.rrid].push(item)
      } else {
        grouped_item_reply[item.id] = grouped_item_reply[item.id] || []
        grouped_item_reply[item.id].push(item)
      }
    })
    for (key in grouped_item_reply) {
      grouped_item_reply[key].sort((e1, e2) => {
        return e1.dateline - e2.dateline
      }).map(item => html += createReply(item, !!item.rrid))
    }
    result = String(html).replace(/<a .*?href="([^"]+)".*?>([^<]+)<\/a>/g,'▪$2：$1▪')
   }else{
   	let html = "软件地址：\nhttps://www.coolapk.com/apk/{{$.data.apkname}}\n";
   	 html +="---复制下面文字到发现规则可看评论---\n"
   	html += "{{$.data.title}}▪回复::https://api.coolapk.com/v6/page/dataList?url=#/feed/apkCommentList?id={{$.data.id}}&sort=&title=最近回复&page={\{page}}&lastItem=\n"

html += "{{$.data.title}}▪发布::https://api.coolapk.com/v6/page/dataList?url=#/feed/apkCommentList?id=256030&sort=dateline_desc&title=最近发布&page={\{page}}&lastItem=\n"

html += "{{$.data.title}}▪热度::https://api.coolapk.com/v6/page/dataList?url=#/feed/apkCommentList?id={{$.data.id}}&sort=popular&title=热度排序&page={\{page}}&lastItem=\n"
   	}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
网页能打开看的基本能看，其他bug未知
搜索格式如下
①综合：直接搜索

以下需关闭精确搜索
②用户：@用户名@
③超话：%超话名%
④话题：#话题名#

更改下面数字可查看评论（不登录只有20条，登录后条数太多会请求频繁导致获取正文为空【可以选择清除cookie回到未登录状态】）

是/否开启评论：是20条

// 原始时间字符串 const timeStr = mblog.created_at // 创建 Date 对象 const date = new Date(timeStr); const year = date.getFullYear(); const month = String(date.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); const day = String(date.getDate()).padStart(2, '0'); const hours = String(date.getHours()).padStart(2, '0'); const minutes = String(date.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0'); const seconds = String(date.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0'); const customFormat = `${year}-${month}-${day} ${hours}:${minutes}:${seconds}`; let picsJ = mblog.pics; let pics = ""; if(picsJ)picsJ.forEach(y=>{ pics +="\n" }) html += "-⬇️ 编辑于"+customFormat+" ⬇️ -\n"+mblog.text+"\n"+pics+"\n‎\n"; }) result = html } if(/timeline_card_small_article_default/.test(result)&&!/title=%E7%BC%96%E8%BE%91%E8%AE%B0%E5%BD%95/.test(baseUrl)){ $ = result.match(/"page_info":\s*(\{[\s\S]+?\}),\s+"bid/)[1]; page = Math.ceil(page/20); mid = baseUrl.match(/(\d+)$/)[1]; max_id="0"; comments=""; count = 0; for(j=1;j<=page;j++){ commentsurl = `https://m.weibo.cn/comments/hotflow?id=${mid}&mid=${mid}&max_id=${max_id}&max_id_type=0`; var times = Math.round(new Date().getTime() / 1000) while(Math.round(new Date().getTime() / 1000)-times<1){} hh= java.ajax(commentsurl); if(/体验微博客户端/.test(hh)){ h={}; page = 2; }else{ h=/登录 - 微博<\/title>/.test(hh)?{}:JSON.parse(hh); if(/<title>登录 - 微博<\/title>/.test(hh)){java.toast("更多评论请登录");break;} } if(h.ok==1){ list=h.data.data; max_id = h.data.max_id; if(j==1){ total = Math.ceil(h.data.total_number/20); page= page<=total?page:total; }} } result + comments } }catch(e){ java.log("错误: "+e) } </js>

<js>

c=baseUrl;
l=[];

edit_count = Number(/"edit_count": \d+/.test(result)?result.match(/"edit_count": (\d+),/)[1]:0);


if(/网页链接/.test(d) || /timeline_card_small_article_default/.test(d)){

		l.push({text:b.substring(0,10)+"......",href:c});
	l.push({
		href:result.match(/"page_url": "([^"]+)",/)[1]+",{'webView':true}",
		text:result.match(/"content1": "([^"]+)",/)[1],
		info:result.match(/ "content2": "([^"]*)",/)[1]
		})
}

if(/网页链接/.test(d)){
	list = d.match(/<br \/>[^<]+<a  href=\\"[^"]+\\" data-hid/g);
	l.push({

		href:c
		})

	l.push({
		text : list[i].match(/>([^<]+)<a/)[1],

		})
	  }
	}
	}else{

		}

if(edit_count>0){

		})
	
	}

</js>

{{

	source.setVariable(String(uptime))
 uptime=new Date(String(uptime))
 lastuptime=new Date(String(lastuptime))
	uptime.getTime()>lastuptime.getTime() ?

}}

◎只看楼主：
在设置源变量（该源所有书应用）或者设置书籍变量（只有本书应用）里填上『只看楼主』则只会显示楼主内容，部分页数可能无正文
◎开启只看楼主并保留用户名和发表时间：
在设置源变量（该源所有书应用）或者设置书籍变量（只有本书应用）里再填上『保留』则会显示楼主的用户名和发表时间以及内容，部分页数可能无正文
❗️注意：楼主如果是『匿名青花鱼』则所有匿名青花鱼发的贴都会显示，正文如果缓存了需要刷新才有效，或者清除缓存

ruleToc.chapterList: var n; if ((result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/))!=null){ n=result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/)[1]; var list=[]; let url; for(let i=1;i<=n;i++){ if(/page/.test(baseUrl)){ url = baseUrl.replace(/page(?:%3D|=)\d+/g,'&page='+i); }else{ url = baseUrl.split(",")[0]+'&page='+i+',{"webView":true}' } list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:url}); } }else if(!result.match(/返回列表/)){ list=[] }else{ var list=[{k:'第1页',v:baseUrl}]; } function getHtml(url){ let lasturl = url java.setContent(String(java.ajax(lasturl))); let html = String(java.getString("@css:.authi a:lt(2),.typeoption,.authicn,.authi em,.t_f@html")); html=html .replace(/<\/td>\s*(◎◎◎◎$1'); let lastlist=html.split("◎◎◎◎"); return lastlist } function  lengthComparator(t,lis,num){ let re; re = new RegExp("\\s*这是"+t+"的楼层数量：(\\d+)"); if(re.test(book.getVariable("custom"))){ let getLast = Number(String(book.getVariable("custom")).match(re)[1]); if(getLastlis.length){ java.longToast("检测到书籍"+"《"+book.name+"》"+list[list.length-num].k+"的\n楼层数量比之前的少，可能是删贴了，❗️谨慎刷新正文") java.log("检测到书籍"+"《"+book.name+"》"+list[list.length-num].k+"的\n楼层数量比之前的少，可能是删贴了，❗️谨慎刷新正文") } }else{ let custom = book.getVariable("custom")+"\n这是"+list[list.length-num].k+"的楼层数量："+lis.length; book.putCustomVariable(custom) } } let last_1,last_2; last_1 = getHtml(list[list.length-1].v); lengthComparator(list[list.length-1].k,last_1,1) if(list.length>=2){ last_2 = getHtml(list[list.length-2].v); lengthComparator(list[list.length-2].k,last_2,2) } let custom = processPageLines(book.getVariable("custom")) book.putCustomVariable(custom) /* //下面的操作是通过更改章节名，重新缓存正文内容，但是如果有新页数，又会变成老的缓存内容，所以废弃，改为toast提示，手动刷新 date = new Date().toLocaleString('zh-CN') list[list.length-1].k = list[list.length-1].k+"•"+date+"楼层更新" */ list

                                    🏷标签
标签名::https://api.lofter.com/oldapi/tagPosts.api?product=lofter-android-6.13.0&method=newTagSearch&offset={{(page-1) *22}}&limit=22&firstpermalink=null&tag=标签名&type=new,{"method": "POST","body":"null"}
📃用户（搜索可以得到)
部分目录章节比较多，加载时间久，出现目录加载失败，请尝试刷新，因为可能是请求失败导致的

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
cookie = cookie.getCookie("https://newsmiss.lofter.com");

lofter = String(cookie).match(/;\s(LOFTER-[^-]+-LOGIN-AUTH)=(.*?);/);

header = {};
header[lofter[1]] = lofter[2];
source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(header));
result;
}catch(e){
	result = result
	}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
if(/\.mp4/.test(baseUrl)){ result = "请点击章节链接观看视频\n视频链接："+baseUrl }else{ content = java.getString("$..content"); imgs = eval(String(java.getString("$..photoLinks"))); video =/video_down_url\\":\\"(.*?)\\"/.test(result)? "视频链接："+String(result).match(/video_down_url\\":\\"(.*?)\\"/)[1]:""; img = ""; imgs?imgs.forEach(x=>{ x?img += "\n":"" }):""; g= (/myReturnGift/.test(baseUrl)&&/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/.test(content))?"🏷 彩蛋 "+java.getString("$..promotion")+"\n":""; result = g+ content + "\n"+img+"\n"+video; if(video && (chapter.index == book.durChapterIndex)){ java.startBrowser(video.replace(/视频链接：/,''),"内容"); result = "❗️刷新本章节播放视频❗️"+result; } } if(result =="\n\n")result = "{{$..msg}}"; result ##tbc\.##

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
list=[];
if(/limit=500/.test(baseUrl)){
pages=java.get("page");
page=parseInt(pages/500);
url=String(java.get("url"));
if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*500)))
}
}else if(/api-grain/.test(baseUrl)){
	offset = "{{$.data.offset}}";
	if(offset!="-1"){
	list = baseUrl.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+offset);
}
	}
list
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
//一行个数
var nums = 4 ;
//分隔符
var separator = '::'

//标题::链接::一行个数::分类

all=[
"----------     🏷标签     ----------::::1",
"进击的巨人::进击的巨人::::a"
];

//@天天gg@酷安 下面不要动
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://zhidao.baidu.com/msearch/ajax/getsearchlist?word="+url+"&pn=10":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="a"?'https://zhidao.baidu.com/msearch/ajax/getsearchlist?word='+url+'&pn=10':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var body="";
if(chapter.isVip()){
body=JSON.parse(result).data
}else{
var cid=baseUrl.match(/\d+\/(\d+)/)[1]
body=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result)).select('main#c-'+cid).html();
}
body
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  var bookId=baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1]
 result=java.ajax("https://wxapp.qidian.com/api/book/categoryV2?bookId="+bookId+"&_csrfToken=")
 var charts=[];
JSON.parse(result).data.vs.map(i=>{
i.cs.map(o=>{
var chart={"id":o.id,"title":o.cN,"v":o.sS==0,"t":o.uT+ "  " + o.cnt +"字"}
if(chart.v){
chart.url="http://qd.yyhydb-123546.top/api/content/qd?bid="+bookId+"&cid="+o.id+"&deviceId="+java.androidId()
}else{
chart.url="https://m.qidian.com/chapter/"+bookId+"/"+o.id+"/"
}
charts.push(chart);
})
})
 charts;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
let d = JSON.parse(result);
let limit = Number(baseUrl.match(/limit=(\d+)/)[1]);
let commentTotal  =  Number(java.getString("$.data.commentTotal"));
let page = Math.ceil(commentTotal/limit);
let p = (Number(baseUrl.match(/offset=(\d+)/)[1])/limit)+1;
function getPlainText(cl) {
    let output = "";
    let cllen = cl.length;
    let sss = String(source.getVariable());
    let re = /^([\[\]橘糖紫糖]|嗑到了|kswl|\d+\.\d+\.\d+|[1234567890一二三四五六七八九十]+刷|打卡)+$|为营造更好的评论环境，/;
    let sre = sss.match(/屏蔽【(.*?)】/)?.[1] ?? null;
    sre = sre ? new RegExp(sre.replace(/,/g, '|'), 'g') : null;    
    let plen = 0;
    let validCount = 0;

    for (let i in cl) {
        let c = cl[i];
        let reply = (c?.replyAll ?? c?.reply);
        let rl = [];
        if (re.test(c.commentBody ?? c.commentbody) || (sre ? sre.test(c.commentBody ?? c.commentbody) : null)) {
            cllen--;
            plen++;
            continue;
        }
        
        // 处理回复
        let replyTotal = Number(c.replyTotal);
if(replyTotal > 5 && /◎缓存回复/.test(sss)) { 	
	let replyUrl = "https://android.jjwxc.net/comment/getReplyList";   
    let offset = 5;
    let limit = replyTotal; 
    let replyBody = `versionCode=444&novelId=${c.novelId}&chapterId=${c.chapterId}&commentId=${c.commentId}&offset=${offset}&limit=${limit}&isBackend=2&token=${getToken()}`;
        let replyPost = {
            "method": "POST",
            "body": replyBody
        }
        let replyList = java.ajax(replyUrl+","+JSON.stringify(replyPost));     
        replyList = JSON.parse(replyList).data;
        reply = reply.concat(replyList);                  
    }


        for (let j in reply) {
            let r = reply[j];
            if (re.test(r.replyBody ?? r.commentbody) || (sre ? sre.test(r.replyBody ?? r.commentbody) : null)) {
                continue;
            }
            
            let authorTag = (r?.isAuthor === "1" ? "👑" : "📜")+r.floor+"楼 ";
            
            rl.push({
                text: `${authorTag} ${r.replyAuthor ?? r.commentauthor} (${(!r.comment_date_time ? undefined : java.timeFormat(r.comment_date_time *1000)) ?? (r.replyDate || r.commentdate)})\n ${replaceEmoticons(r.replyBody ?? r.commentbody)}`
            });
        }
                               
        // 构建主评论
        let authorTag = "";
        if (c?.isAuthor === "1") {
            authorTag = "👑";
        } else if (c?.bulletinComment === "1") {
            authorTag = "📢";
        } else {
            authorTag = "👤";
        }

        // 主评论头部信息（作者、时间、订阅、互动数据）
             
        let header = `${authorTag} ${c.commentAuthor ?? c.commentauthor} `;
        let time = ` 📆${(!c.comment_date_time ? undefined : java.timeFormat(c.comment_date_time * 1000)) ?? (c.commentDate || c.commentdate || '')}`
        // 订阅信息     
        if (c.subscriptionicon) {
            if (c.subscriptionrate) {
                header += ` 📖${c.subscriptionrate}`;
            } else if (c.subscriptionicon.includes("rate_novelallbuy")) {
                header += ` 📖100%`;
            }
        }

        // 互动数据
        header += ` \n👍${c.agreenum ?? "0"}`;
        if (c.commentMark) header += ` ⭐️${c.commentMark}`;
        
        output += "\n"+header + time+ "\n";
        output += `${replaceEmoticons(c.commentBody ?? c.commentbody)}`;




        // 回复内容
        if (rl.length > 0) {
            output += "\n‎\n🔁 回复内容:\n";
            rl.forEach(reply => {
                output += `  ${reply.text}\n`;
            });
        }
        if(replyTotal > 5 && !/◎缓存回复/.test(sss)){
        output= output.replace(/\n$/,'')+getImage(replyTotal,c.novelId,c.chapterId,c.commentId)
        }
	
        output += "\n‎\n";
        validCount++;
    }

    // 添加统计信息
    let stats = `🏷本章共有${commentTotal}条评论 | 共有${page}页\n💬当前第${p}页显示 ${validCount} 条评论 | 屏蔽 ${plen} 条评论`;
      
    return stats + "\n\n" + output;
}
let msg = d?.data.commentTotal?null:d.message;
if(msg){
	java.toast(msg);
}else{
result = getPlainText(d.data.commentList);
if(/\d+-\d+/.test(book.getVariable("custom"))){
     if(/offset=0/.test(baseUrl)&&!/1-\d+/.test(book.getVariable("custom"))){
     	result = ""
     	}
}
result.replace(/</g,'<')
.replace(/>/g,'>')
}
</js>
ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
function getPage(allpage,limit){	
list=[];
len=allpage>5?5:allpage;
start=1;end=len;
if(book.getVariable("custom")!=""){
start=Number(book.getVariable("custom").match(/(\d+)-\d+/)[1]);
end=Number(book.getVariable("custom").match(/\d+-(\d+)/)[1]);
if(end>allpage)end=allpage;
}
let bs = start;
if(start===1)start=2;
java.toast("共加载"+(end-bs+1)+"页，加载较慢...请稍候")
for(i=start;i<=end;i++){
	let offset = (i-1)*limit;
list.push(
	baseUrl.replace(/offset=0/,'offset='+offset)
	);
}
return list
	}

if(!/comment.php/.test(book.bookUrl)){
	let msg = JSON.parse(result)?.data.commentTotal??false;
	if(msg){
let limit = Number(baseUrl.match(/limit=(\d+)/)[1]);
let commentTotal  =  Number(java.getString("$.data.commentTotal"));
let allpage = Math.ceil(commentTotal/limit);
getPage(allpage,limit)
}
}
</js>

variableComment:
1、设置书籍变量处可填写（只会应用于当前书籍）

  开始页-结束页  ——   如10-20 
则评论从第10页开始，第20页结束
默认最多从第1页至第10页结束

2、设置源变量处可填写（应用于所有书）

屏蔽【屏蔽词,屏蔽词,屏蔽词】 ——  如 屏蔽【磕到了,营养液】只要有屏蔽词就不显示此评论。
注意用英文逗号【,】分隔屏蔽词，【】符号不能少。

 ◎数量  ——  如 ◎1000 则每页显示1000条评论，默认为500，注意数字太大可能会失败。
 
◎回复 —— 评论按照回复时间排序，默认为点赞数排序

◎长评 —— 只显示长评
 
 ◎缓存回复 —— 更多回复加载到正文（填写后刷新正文，❗️注意：当前页有很多评论有更多回复，会导致正文加载速度非常慢！有500条更多回复就要请求500次！），不填写则是刷新图片可以查看更多回复，正文加载速度较快。
 
 注意◎符号不能少。
 
（更改完书籍变量或源变量一定要先刷新详情页，再刷新正文）

bookSourceComment: //七猫中文网

// Error: 发现失效

❗️一些功能
1、每隔八小时访问一遍签到（使用的时候访问）
2、点击“登录”自定义发现
3、更改过发现要刷新本书源才会生效
4、点击章节链接可以查看评论，注意要设置成内部浏览器，长按章节链接可以设置
5、设置源变量或设置书籍变量可以查看一些功能说明
❗️注意事项:
1、请不要退出晋江app的账号，只要点了退出，或者在其他地方登录了，都要重新抓token。
2、更新token，书籍就要更新目录。
3、【抓包token登录】和【账号登录】二选一，【抓包token登录】的优先级高些，填了【抓包token登录】，就是按【抓包token登录的值】登录
4、登录步骤【设备保护关闭的状态下】：
①填写好账号密码，点击“邮箱验证码”或者“手机验证码”
②填写好验证码，点击“邮箱登录”或者“手机登录”
③想要确认是否成功可以在登录UI里点右上角三点，查看登录头token里是否有值。
④如果弹出提示“请校检验证码”，可尝试填入上一次发送给你验证码。
5、如果邮箱和手机号无法登录，可能是需要过滑动验证码，可尝试先在晋江app里登录一遍后，再在阅读里登录，❗️还是不行就只能抓包token，填写在“抓包token登录”处。

  const [title, url, num = defaultNumPerRow] = data.split(separator);
  
  const fullUrl = /^\d+|natural/.test(url) 
    ? `http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%22${url}%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148`
    : url;
  
  return [title, fullUrl, num];
}

// 解析标签数据
function parseTag(data, tagCategory) {
  const [title, url, num = defaultNumPerRow, tagType] = data.split(separator);a();
  
  let fullUrl = url;
  if (tagType === "bq") {
    fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=${url}&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=${tagCategory}&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token=${token}`;l();
  } else if (tagType === "at") {
  	fullUrl = `https://app-cdn.jjwxc.com/androidapi/authorColumn?authorid=${url}`;
  	
  	}else if (tagType === "class") {
  	fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/incrementFavorite,{'method':'POST','body':\"versionCode=313&token=${token}&order=0&classId=${url}&backupTime=${Date.now()}\"}`
  	
  	}else if (tagType === "lx") {
    fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=${tagCategory}&sd=0&lx=${url}&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token=${token}`;
  }
  return [title, fullUrl, num];
}

// 创建 FlexBox 对象
function createFlexBox(title, url, num) {
  const flexBasisMap = { 1: 1, 2: 0.4, 3: 0.25, 4: 0.2, 5: 0.15, 7: 0.1, 10: 0.05 };
  return {
    title,
    url: url || '',
    style: {
      layout_flexGrow: 1,
      layout_flexBasisPercent: flexBasisMap[num]
    }
  };
}

// 生成分类结果
const result = [];
result.push(createFlexBox(`📂 我的收藏`, "https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/incrementFavorite,{\"method\":\"POST\",\"body\":\"versionCode=313&token={{Map('token')}}&order=0&classId=&backupTime={{Date.now()}}\"}", 1));

if(ShelfNum){
const ShelfNumList = String(ShelfNum).split(",");
ShelfNumList.forEach(x => {
  const parsedTag = parseTag(ShelfList[x]);
  result.push(createFlexBox(parsedTag[0], parsedTag[1], parsedTag[2],parsedTag[3]));
});
}


authorNames.forEach(tag => {
  const parsedTag = parseTag(tag, tagCategory);
  result.push(createFlexBox(parsedTag[0], parsedTag[1], parsedTag[2],parsedTag[3]));
});

all.forEach(item => {
  const parsedItem = parseCategory(item);
  result.push(createFlexBox(parsedItem[0], parsedItem[1], parsedItem[2]));
});

const enabledCategoryList = enabledCategories.split(",");
enabledCategoryList.forEach(categoryIndex => {
  const categoryName = categories[categoryIndex];
  if (categoryData[categoryName]) {
    result.push(createFlexBox(`${分类标识} ${categoryName}连载`, null, 1));
    categoryData[categoryName].连载.forEach(item => {
      const parsedItem = parseCategory(item);
      result.push(createFlexBox(parsedItem[0], parsedItem[1], parsedItem[2]));
    });
    result.push(createFlexBox(`${分类标识} ${categoryName}完结`, null, 1));
    categoryData[categoryName].完结.forEach(item => {
      const parsedItem = parseCategory(item);
      result.push(createFlexBox(parsedItem[0], parsedItem[1], parsedItem[2]));
    });
    result.push(createFlexBox(`${榜单标识} ${categoryName}榜单`, null, 1));
    categoryData[categoryName].榜单.forEach(item => {
      const parsedItem = parseCategory(item);
      result.push(createFlexBox(parsedItem[0], parsedItem[1], parsedItem[2]));
    });
  }
});

result.push(createFlexBox(`${标签标识} ${tagName}标签`, null, 1));
tags.forEach(tag => {
  const parsedTag = parseTag(tag, tagCategory);
  result.push(createFlexBox(parsedTag[0], parsedTag[1], parsedTag[2],parsedTag[3]));
});

JSON.stringify(result)
</js>

try{ const bbb = book.getVariable("custom"); const sss = source.getVariable(); if (/jjwxc|vipContent/.test(baseUrl)) { function decode(){ baseUrl = `https://app.jjwxc.org/androidapi/chapterContent?versionCode=381&${bDe(baseUrl)}`; //let date = "Mobile " + Date.now(); let response = java.get(baseUrl, {}); let content = String(response.body()); isPay = !/"content"/.test(content); if(isPay){ let accesskey = String(response.header("accesskey"));l(); let keyString = String(response.header("keystring")); let accesskeyLen = accesskey.length; let v6 = accesskey.charCodeAt(accesskeyLen - 1); let v9 = 0; for (var i = 0; i < accesskey.length; i++) { v9 += accesskey.charCodeAt(i);l(); } let v15 = v9 % keyString.length; let v17 = Math.floor(v9 / 65); let v18 = keyString.length; let v43 = keyString.substring(v15, v17 + v15 > v18 ? v18 : v17 + v15);l(); let v32 = content.length; let [v38, dest] = (v6 & 1) !== 0 ? [content.slice(-12), content.slice(0, -12)] : [content.slice(0, 12), content.slice(12)]; let key = java.md5Encode(v43 + v38).slice(0, 8); let iv = java.md5Encode(v38).slice(0, 8); content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", key, iv).decryptStr(dest); } return content } let intro = String(java.get("intro1")).replace(/\s/g, ''); const hasContent = /"content"/.test(result); java.setContent(hasContent ? result : decode()); intro = intro ? `◎${intro}◎
` : ''; let content = String(java.getString("$..content")); let saybody = (/关闭作话/.test(bbb) || /关闭作话/.test(sss))?"":java.getString("$..sayBody"); let say = /[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/.test(saybody) ? `\n【📢作者有话说】\n${saybody}` : ''; if (/token|vipContent/.test(baseUrl)) { const vipc = content.length > 30 ? java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", "KW8Dvm2N", "1ae2c94b").decryptStr(content) : `${java.getString("$..message")}\n登录后请更新目录，刷新正文`; result = intro + vipc + say; } else { result = intro + content + say; } } else { result = ""; } // 评论处理 if (/评论\d+/.test(bbb) || /评论\d+/.test(sss)) { const commentNum = (/评论(\d+)/.exec(bbb) || /评论(\d+)/.exec(sss))[1]; const commentUrl = baseUrl.replace(/androidapi/, 'comment').replace(/chapterContent/, 'getCommentList') + `&limit=${commentNum}&offset=0`; const comment = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)); const cflag = comment.code === "200" || comment.code === undefined; let commentb = ''; if (cflag) { const commentList = comment.commentList || comment.data?.commentList || []; commentb = commentList.map(b => `@${b.commentAuthor} 🕘${b.commentDate}\n${b.commentBody}\n‎\n`).join(''); } else { commentb = comment.message; } result += `\nㅤ\n最新评论：\n${commentb.replace(/<br>/g, '\n')}`; } result; }catch(e){} ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+|◎\s+?◎|◎undefined◎

//去除章节简介与正文重复
if(/^◎/.test(result) ){
	chapter = result.match(/◎([\s\S]+?)(…)*◎/)[1].replace(/\s/g,'').replace(/,/g,'，');
	chapter2=result.match(/◎[\s\S]+?◎([\s\S]+)/)[1].replace(/\s/g,'').replace(/,/g,'，');

	//前4个字相同就删除
	num = 4;
	if(chapter.substring(0,num)==chapter2.substring(0,num)){
		result = result.replace(/◎[\s\S]+?◎\s*/,'')
	}else{result}
}else{result}

function removeDuplicatedParagraphs(text, chapterTitle) {
    var paragraphs = text.split('\n');
    var firstParagraph = paragraphs[0].trim();
    var containsSpecialChar = firstParagraph.includes('◎');
    var targetIndex = containsSpecialChar ? 1 : 0;
    var targetParagraph = paragraphs[targetIndex].trim();
    var lastChar = targetParagraph.charAt(targetParagraph.length - 1);
    var isPunctuation = /[——◎。！？，；：、\.\?!,;:》 】）”’…~"'\)]/.test(lastChar);
    
    if (!isPunctuation) {
        for (var char of chapterTitle) {
            if (targetParagraph.includes(char)) {
                if (char === ' ' || char === '☪') continue;
                java.log("删除当前段落："+targetParagraph)
                java.log("当前章节名："+chapterTitle)
                java.log("相同文字："+char)
                paragraphs.splice(targetIndex, 1);
                break;
            }
        }
    }
    return paragraphs.join('\n');
}

let bbb = String(book.getVariable("custom"));
let sss = String(source.getVariable());

//净化第一段章节名
if(/净化/.test(sss)||/净化/.test(bbb))result = removeDuplicatedParagraphs(result, title);
result = result.replace(/<br\/>/g,'\n');

result
</js>

variableComment:
❗️缓存过的东西都是需要刷新才生效【正文，目录】

1、书籍变量（当前书）
填写[章节名]  ——  变为第xx章 章节名

填写 [去章节序号] —— 去除章节序号 

填写 [目录简介【符号】] —— 章节简介放到目录列表，正文不出现
符号：跟章节名连接时中间的符号，如 目录简介【 】，中间将为空格

填写[目录简介【删除】]——删除正文章节简介【需要更新目录后刷新正文】

填写[关闭作话]——删除作话

填写[净化] —— 这个是用来删除正文第一段是章节名的，可能会误伤。

填写 [评论+评论数量]——如 评论50  则正文显示50条评论，数量必填

填写 [开启购买/关闭购买]  —— 如 开启购买 则会开启自动购买下五章【确认以后点右上角三点刷新才会生效，使用完毕后最好删除，避免重复请求】

ruleSearch.lastChapter: .new@text##正文卷.|正文.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|卷_|VIP章节.|免费章节.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求更票谢乐发订合补加架字修Kk].*?[】）\)]

ruleToc.chapterName:
text##^\d+\.|（.*合.*|（含.*|\(.*合.*|\(含.*
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节|免费章节.|章节目录)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
